hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Water Temple Boss Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #2# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Hylian Shield#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #an Ocarina# and #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #a Forest Temple Compass#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Deku Stick#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Deku Stick#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #a Map of the Shadow Temple# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Morpha#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Zora Mask#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Zora Mask#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Kakariko Bazaar#.
